author: Michael Wayland
title: GM furloughs more workers as union strike enters fourth week
description: The company on Monday told about 415 of 2,100 employees who produce V-8 engines and transmissions at a facility in Mexico not to come to work.
content:
DETROIT The United Auto Workers' strike against General Motors, now in its fourth week, is continuing to hit the automaker's operations outside of the U.S.
The company halted production of a V-8 engine and transmission at its engine plant in Ramos Arizpe, Co… [+873 chars]
